    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(char[][] state,
             char[] types,
             java.awt.Point[][][] ruleset,
             Player[] players)
        Board Class Constructor
        Parameters:
        state - game board where each char depicts Chip type
        types - list of Chip types available on the board
        ruleset - valid movesets of corresponding type passed as a Point object calculated as an offset from Chip origin.
        players - list of players participating to assign to chips

    • Method Detail

      • updateState

        public char[][] updateState(java.awt.Point[] stateChange)
        Updates the state of the board with player move and removed enemy
        Parameters:
        stateChange - stateChange[0] = Origin stateChange[1] = destination stateChange[2]...[n] = enemies to remove
        Returns:
        updated char[][] of the board state

      • checkKinged

        public boolean checkKinged(int x,
                           int y)
        Evaluate chip object for king status
        Parameters:
        x - Row location of chip to be checked
        y - Column location of chip to be checked
        Returns:
        true if chip is King

      • isValidMoveChip

        public boolean isValidMoveChip(java.awt.Point from,
                               java.awt.Point to,
                               boolean ext)
        Determine if the chip placement is a valid move
        Parameters:
        from - Origin of the piece to move
        to - Destination of the piece to move
        ext - is piece using extended moveset
        Returns:
        returns true if move is within valid chip moveset

      • getChipOwner

        public Player getChipOwner(java.awt.Point origin)
        Simple method to return the owner of a chip on the board
        Parameters:
        origin - Coordinates of the origin of the chip
        Returns:
        returns the owner of the designated chip

      • isChip

        public boolean isChip(java.awt.Point origin)
        Simple method to determine if the place on the board is a Chip
        Parameters:
        origin - Coordinates of the origin of the chip
        Returns:
        true if the coordinate location contains a Chip object

      • getCurrentState

        public char[][] getCurrentState()
        Convert board chip array to char array for return to game logic processor
        Returns:

      • getPossibleMoves

        public java.awt.Point[][] getPossibleMoves(Player activePlayer)
        Returns all possible moves that can be made by player
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - The player chips to be examined
        Returns:
        Array of Points containing all possible moves where Point[] is the point pair including the Point[n][0]: Origin and Point[n][1]: Destination points.

        to - Destination
        Returns:
